page.title: 12The Voe Water Supply
page.content: Gonfirth Loch is situated behind the hill of Sneugie.Most people in Voe get their water supply from this loch. Before the water leaves the loch it is put through sand filters and chlorus is added to kill any bacteria. The machinery at the loch is checked daily.Occasionally,if something does go wrong the Waterboard men are called out to do repairs.If for any reason the water supply has to be stopped from reaching the houses then a valve is turned. Sometimes the loch freezes up and the ice can be up to four inches thick. However,there has never been a water shortage because the loch gets more water from springs underneath it. Gonfirth Loch is one of the highest lochs in Shetland.
